lines: CH 173AH 404SDAH 602
301MUNYINA SUMINA
O BROTHER BE FAITHFUL
Doh is Ab
Mukwesu syomeka Jesu Ôlaboola oyo ngotwalindilila,
Kufwamba tunjile munzi umweka, Kwiimba lwiimbo lwakuzunda
Mukwesu syomeka ku mufutuli Nkaambo nzi ncotasyomeki
Luyando lupati olutamani, wakafwa kutufula
Munzi wa golide ulibambidwe Kuli baabo basyomeka,
Milyango ilindila kujalulwa Tunjile mukulyokezya,
Mukwesu syomeka tatukokkala mukupenga amukusa,
Musinze wakuusa lino wamana tunjile mukusalala.
Mukwesu syomeka Jesu ulaboola, Mwami Mulengi Singuzu
Izyuulu zyabangeli zyilanguwe, Amaluba akuzunda,
Mukwesu syomeka lino ulamvwa, Ijwi lya Mwami lilaamba,
Mulanda usyomeka watambulwa Mukukkomana kwa Mwami
Myaka mibotu yakupona lyoonse, lyotondezya kusyomeka
Kukkomana a musyini umweka kuyogusya imisozi
Mukwesu cisyomyo cili masimpe, Cilindilila bakasunkwa
Kulela antoomwe aba kazunda, A Jesu kutakamani.
